content:
Prev: Dog sled Up: Spring Break in Mammoth Next: Sara skiing again

Sara skiing



At the end of the day, we persuaded her to take off the "edgy-wedgy" holding the toes of her skis together, for the flattest part of the run. The next two days, she didn't use it at all.
Taken Monday, March 25, 2002, 03:51:42pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1019kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/1000s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 377mm
